attributes.additional_details: There is a known problem of illegal migrants with family/friends that live in the UK with a legal right to stay, helping to hide migrants from the authorities.  The Law should state that if you participate in such action that you and your direct family will loose your right to remain in the UK and have any citizenship revoked if this has been granted.  The UK voted to leave the EU to take control of our laws and borders and such a law is essential to protect the UK.
attributes.background: Makes it a deportation offence for Family, friends and associates that hold legal right to live/work in the UK to aid any person/family/group to enter/remain in the UK Illegally. Failure to report illegal migrants will put your status at risk.

rejection.details: It is already an offence to assist someone who is in the country.  Decisions on sentencing are a matter for the courts.
